ing.item: Texas Ruby Red or Rio Star; (red!) grapefruit (do not substitute)

directions.step:
Segment the Ruby Red grapefruit. Peel the segments to remove the fibrous parts and the skin of the individual segments. Cut the remaining flesh into "chunks".
Remove the seeds from the jalapeno pepper and mince it finely.
Mix all three prepared ingredients together and serve chilled as a relish. Posted to MM-Recipes Digest V5 #014 by gep2@computek.net on Jan 14, 1998
